mapper.select: SELECT A.nm, A.pic, A.created_at AS createdAt , COUNT(DISTINCT B.ifeed) AS feedCnt , COUNT(C.ifeed) AS favCnt , D.following, D.follower, D.followState FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_feed B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav C ON B.ifeed = C.ifeed INNER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(CASE from_iuser when #{targetIuser} then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS following , SUM(CASE to_iuser WHEN #{targetIuser} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS follower , (SUM(CASE WHEN from_iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND to_iuser = #{targetIuser} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN from_iuser = #{targetIuser} AND to_iuser = #{loginedIuser} THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)) AS followState FROM t_user_follow ) AS D WHERE A.iuser = #{targetIuser}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_user_follow WHERE from_iuser = #{fromIuser} and to_iuser =#{toIuser}
